Key Match Events: The game was suspended after four pitches in the first inning due to persistent rain.
Pre-Game Insights: The White Sox, with the worst record in baseball, is looking to end a four-game winless streak.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game will be made up on Wednesday as part of a doubleheader.
Others: RHP Jacob deGrom threw 16 of 24 pitches for strikes in his second rehab start for Triple-A Round Rock.
INF Jake Amaya was added to the active roster a day after being claimed off waivers from Houston.
